00042     public function init()
00043     {
00044         parent::init();
00045         
00046         //  Add our options
00047         $this->addOptions( self::getBaseOptions() );
00048 
00049         //  Set base values
00050         $this->actions = array( 'index', 'create', 'update', 'admin', '_form' );
00051 
00052         $this->baseClass = 'CPSModel';
00053         $this->templateName = 'model.php';
00054 
00055         $this->controllerBaseClass = 'CPSCRUDController';
00056         $this->controllerTemplateName = 'controller.php';
00057 
00058         $this->name = 'pscrud';
00059     }

00066     public function run( $arArgs )
00067     {
00068         //  Process arguments...
00069         $arArgs = $this->processArguments( $arArgs );
00070 
00071         //  Check args...
00072         if ( ! ( $_sModelClass = PS::o( $arArgs, 0, null ) ) )
00073         {
00074             echo $this->bold( 'Error' ) . ': model class name is required.' . PHP_EOL;
00075             echo $this->getHelp();
00076             return;
00077         }
00078         
00079         //  Any id?
00080         $_sControllerId = trim( PS::o( $arArgs, 1, null ) );
00081         
00082         //  Load the module
00083         $_oModule = $this->loadModule( $_sModelClass );
00084                 
00085         //  Import the model
00086         $_sModelClass = Yii::import( $_sModelClass );
00087 
00088         //  Get controller stuff
00089         list( $_sControllerClass, $_sControllerFile, $_sControllerId ) = $this->parseControllerId( $_sModelClass, $_sControllerId, $_oModule );
00090 
00091         $_sViewPath = $_oModule->viewPath . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . str_replace( '.', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $_sControllerId );
00092         
00093         //  Build our parameter array
00094         $_arList = array(
00095             basename( $_sControllerFile ) => array(
00096                 'source' => $this->templatePath . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $this->controllerTemplateName,
00097                 'target' => $_sControllerFile,
00098                 'callback' => array( $this, 'generateController' ),
00099                 'params' => array( $_sControllerClass, $_sModelClass ),
00100             ),
00101         );
00102 
00103         //  Actions
00104         foreach ( $this->actions as $_sAction )
00105         {
00106             $_arList[ $_sAction.'.php' ] = array(
00107                 'source' => $this->templatePath . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $_sAction . '.php',
00108                 'target' => $_sViewPath . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $_sAction . '.php',
00109                 'callback' => array( $this, 'generateView' ),
00110                 'params' => array( $_sControllerClass, $_sModelClass, $_sAction ),
00111             );
00112         }
00113 
00114         //  Show generator header
00115         echo $this->displayParameters( 'CRUD Generator', array( 'Output Path' => $_sViewPath ) );
00116         
00117         //  Generate
00118         $_arList = $this->copyFiles( $_arList );
00119         echo $this->getResultDisplay( $_arList );
00120     }
00121 
00129     public function generateController( $sSourceFile, $arParams )
00130     {
00131         list( $_sControllerClass, $_sModelClass ) = $arParams;
00132         
00133         $_oModel = CPSModel::model( $_sModelClass );
00134 
00135         //  Fall back to default ones
00136         if ( ! is_file( $sSourceFile ) ) $sSourceFile = YII_PATH . '/cli/views/shell/crud/' . basename( $sSourceFile );
00137 
00138         //  Render
00139         return $this->renderFile( 
00140             $sSourceFile,
00141             array(
00142                 'ID' => PS::nvl( $_oModel->tableSchema->primaryKey, '' ),
00143                 'controllerClass' => $_sControllerClass,
00144                 'modelClass' => $_sModelClass,
00145                 'baseClass' => $this->controllerBaseClass,
00146                 'databaseName' => $this->databaseName,
00147             ),
00148             true
00149         );
00150 
00151 //      echo "Model \"" . $this->bold( $_sModelClass ) . "\" not found. Unable to generate controller \"" . $this->bold( $_sControllerClass ) . "\".\n";
00152         
00153 //      return null;
00154     }

00163     public function generateView( $sSource, $arParams = array() )
00164     {
00165         list( $_sControllerClass, $_sModelClass, $_sAction ) = $arParams;
00166 
00167         try
00168         {
00169             if ( $_oModel = CPSModel::model( $_sModelClass ) )
00170             {
00171                 $_oTable = $_oModel->getTableSchema();
00172                 $_arColumns = $_oTable->columns;
00173                 
00174                 if ( isset( $_oTable->primaryKey ) ) unset( $_arColumns[ $_oTable->primaryKey ] );
00175 
00176                 //  Check source file...
00177                 if ( ! is_file( $sSource ) ) 
00178                 {
00179                     //  Try our generic view, then default framework
00180                     if ( ! is_file( $sSource = Yii::getPathOfAlias( 'pogostick.templates.crud' ) . '/view.php' ) )
00181                         $sSource = YII_PATH . '/cli/views/shell/crud/' . basename( $sSource );
00182                 }
00183                 
00184                 return $this->renderFile( $sSource,
00185                     array(
00186                         'ID' => PS::nvl( $_oTable->primaryKey, '' ),
00187                         'modelClass' => $_sModelClass,
00188                         'columns' => $_arColumns
00189                     ),
00190                     true
00191                 );
00192             }
00193         }
00194         catch ( Exception $_ex )
00195         {
00196         }
00197 
00198         echo "Model \"" . $this->bold( $_sModelClass ) . "\" not found. Unable to generate view \"" . $this->bold( $_sAction ) . "\".\n";
00199         return null;
00200     }

00219     public function generateInputField( $sModelClass, $oColumn )
00220     {
00221         if ( $oColumn->type === 'boolean' ) return "PS::field( PS::CHECK, \$model, '{$oColumn->name}' )";
00222         
00223         if ( false !== stripos( $oColumn->dbType, 'text' ) )
00224             return "PS::field( PS::TEXTAREA, \$model, '{$oColumn->name}', array( 'rows' => 6, 'cols' => 50 ) )";
00225             
00226         $_sType = ( preg_match( '/^(password|pass|passwd|passcode)$/i', $oColumn->name ) ) ? 'PS::PASSWORD' : 'PS::TEXT';
00227 
00228         if ( $oColumn->type !== 'string' || $oColumn->size === null )
00229             return "PS::field( {$_sType}, \$model, '{$_oColumn->name}' )";
00230 
00231         if ( ( $_iSize = $_iMaxLength = $oColumn->size ) > 60 ) $_iSize = 60;
00232 
00233         return "PS::field( {$_sType}, $model, '{$oColumn->name}', array( 'size' => $_iSize, 'maxlength' => $_iMaxLength ) )";
00234     }
00235 
00240     public function getHelp()
00241     {
00242         $_sName = $this->bold( $this->name );
00243         $_sOptions = $this->getDisplayOptions();
00244         
00245         return <<<EOD
00246 USAGE
00247     \033[1m{$_sName}\033[0m <\033[1mmodel-class\033[0m> [\033[1mcontroller-ID\033[0m] [options]
00248 
00249 DESCRIPTION
00250   This command generates a controller and views that accomplish
00251   CRUD operations for the specified data model.
00252 
00253 PARAMETERS
00254  * model-class: required, the name of the data model class. This can
00255    also be specified as a path alias (e.g. application.models.Post).
00256    If the model class belongs to a module, it should be specified
00257    as 'ModuleID.models.ClassName'.
00258 
00259  * controller-ID: optional, the controller ID (e.g. 'post').
00260    If this is not specified, the model class name will be used
00261    as the controller ID. In this case, if the model belongs to
00262    a module, the controller will also be created under the same
00263    module.
00264 
00265    If the controller should be located under a subdirectory,
00266    please specify the controller ID as 'path/to/ControllerID'
00267    (e.g. 'admin/user').
00268 
00269    If the controller belongs to a module (different from the module
00270    that the model belongs to), please specify the controller ID
00271    as 'ModuleID/ControllerID' or 'ModuleID/path/to/Controller'.
00272 
00273 OPTIONS
00274 
00275   -f, --force                  if the files exists, you will be able to 
00276                                    optionally overwrite them.
00277                                    
00278   -d, --database               The database component to use. 
00279                                    Defaults to 'db'
00280 
00281   -b, --base-class             The base class to use for generated controllers. 
00282                                    Defaults to 'CPSCRUDController'
00283                                    
00284   -t, --template-path          The template path to use.
00285   
00286   -n, --template-name          The name of the template to use. 
00287                                    Defaults to 'controller.php'
00288 
00289 {$_sOptions}
00290 EXAMPLES
00291  * Generates CRUD for the Post model:
00292         {$_sName} Post
00293 
00294  * Generates CRUD for the Post model which belongs to module 'admin':
00295         {$_sName} admin.models.Post
00296 
00297  * Generates CRUD for the Post model. The generated controller should
00298    belong to module 'admin', but not the model class:
00299         {$_sName} Post admin/post
00300 
00301 EOD;
00302     }

00313     private function getBaseOptions()
00314     {
00315         return(
00316             array(
00317                 'actions' => 'array:array()',
00318             )
00319         );
